keyword: in n out animal fries calories
title: Calories in In-N-Out Animal Fries
meta_description: Learn calories in In-N-Out Animal Fries: one serving packs 760 kcal with full nutrition details on carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard order: medium fries topped with two cheese slices, grilled onions, and animal spread (thousand island-style sauce); based on official In-N-Out data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, customizations, and preparation; check In-N-Out's official site or app for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One serving of In-N-Out Animal Fries contains 760 calories and 20 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast food info.

faqs.q: How many calories in In-N-Out Animal Fries?
What are the macros for In-N-Out Animal Fries?
faqs.a: 67 g carbs, 20 g protein, 51 g total fat (17 g saturated).

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out Animal Fries high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1250 mg sodium per serving due to cheese and spread.

faqs.q: How much fiber in In-N-Out Animal Fries calories query?
faqs.a: 6 g dietary fiber from the fries, helping offset some carbs.

faqs.q: Can I make In-N-Out Animal Fries lower calorie?
faqs.a: Skip cheese or use light spread to reduce by 200+ calories.
